mapper.select: SELECT D.TRIP_REVIEW_TITLE , D.TRIP_REVIEW_CONTENT , D.TRIP_REVIEW_DATE , D.TRIP_REVIEW_GRADE , A.USER_NAME , F.REVIEW_IMAGE_SAVED_NAME , E.TRIP_REPLY_DETAIL , D.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_CODE = C.USER_CODE) AS APPLYNAME FROM USER A JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST B ON (A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) JOIN JOIN_TRIP_APPLY C ON (B.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = C.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REVIEW D ON(C.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE = D.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE) JOIN REVIEW_IMAGE F ON(D.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE = F.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE) LEFT JOIN TRIP_REPLY E ON(D.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE = E.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE) WHERE A.USER_GUIDE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USER_CODE = #{guideCode} ORDER BY D.TRIP_REVIEW_CODE DESC

SELECT E.TRIP_TITLE , E.TRIP_INTRO , F.TRIP_IMAGE_SAVED_NAME , B.REGIST_TYPE_CODE FROM USER A JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST B ON (A.USER_CODE = B.USER_CODE) JOIN TRIP E ON(B.TRIP_CODE = E.TRIP_CODE) JOIN TRIP_IMAGE F ON (E.TRIP_CODE = F.TRIP_CODE) JOIN GUIDE_TRIP G ON(E.TRIP_CODE = G.TRIP_CODE) WHERE A.USER_GUIDE_YN = 'Y' AND A.USER_CODE = #{guideCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRIP_REVIEW A JOIN JOIN_TRIP_APPLY B ON(A.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE = B.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST C ON (B.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = C.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN USER D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) WHERE D.USER_CODE = #{guideCode}

SELECT AVG(A.TRIP_REVIEW_GRADE) FROM TRIP_REVIEW A JOIN JOIN_TRIP_APPLY B ON(A.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE = B.JOIN_TRIP_APPLY_CODE) JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST C ON (B.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = C.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN USER D ON(C.USER_CODE = D.USER_CODE) WHERE D.USER_CODE = #{guideCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE TRIP_REGIST_LIST A JOIN USER C ON(A.USER_CODE = C.USER_CODE) SET A.REGIST_TYPE_CODE = 4 WHERE C.USER_CODE = #{guideCode}
UPDATE TRIP_REGIST_LIST A JOIN USER C ON(A.USER_CODE = C.USER_CODE) SET A.REGIST_TYPE_CODE = 3 WHERE C.USER_CODE = #{guideCode}
mapper.select: SELECT A.TRIP_INQUIRY_CODE , A.INQUIRY_REASON , A.INQUIRY_YN ,(SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_CODE = A.USER_CODE) AS APPLYNAME FROM TRIP_INQUIRY A JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST B ON(A.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = B.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN USER C ON(B.USER_CODE = C.USER_CODE) WHERE C.USER_CODE = #{guideCode} ORDER BY TRIP_INQUIRY_CODE DESC

SELECT A.TRIP_INQUIRY_CODE ,A.INQUIRY_REASON ,(SELECT USER_NAME FROM USER U WHERE U.USER_CODE = A.USER_CODE) AS APPLYNAME FROM TRIP_INQUIRY A JOIN TRIP_REGIST_LIST B ON(A.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE = B.TRIP_REGIST_LIST_CODE) JOIN USER C ON(B.USER_CODE = C.USER_CODE) WHERE A.TRIP_INQUIRY_CODE = #{tripInquiryCode}
